Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

hmtx

-/-

Compare advance width against base glyph advance width (tolerance 2 units).

'uniA8F2' (ID 873): width is 360, base glyph ('candrabindudeva' (ID 5)) width is 0

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

OK: No unnecessary tables.

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0000

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0000.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0xA8FD

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xA8FD.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed Thin' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th' (NID 1).

Pass

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

but what do think about this

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

MS NID 14

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed Light' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

MS NID 16

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Noto Sans Devanagari'

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed'

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '33' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Noto Sans Devanagari'

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '39' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed Medium' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md' (NID 1).

Pass

Pass

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed Bold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '42' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd' (NID 1).

Pass

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Devanagari ExtraCondensed Black' ≠ 'Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk' (NID 1).

Pass

Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://www.google.com/get/noto/'

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

PostScript names

PostScript names

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'eshortvowelsignrephanusvarade
oshortvowelsignrephanusvaradeva
rvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
rrvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
lvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
llvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
ecandravowelsigncandrabindudeva
eshortvowelsigncandrabindudeva
ocandravowelsigncandrabindudeva
oshortvowelsigncandrabindudeva

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Th Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedThin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'eshortvowelsignrephanusvarade
oshortvowelsignrephanusvaradeva
rvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
rrvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
lvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
llvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
ecandravowelsigncandrabindudeva

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XLt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'eshortvowelsignrephanusvarade
oshortvowelsignrephanusvaradeva
rvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva
rrvocalicvowelsignnuktaleftdeva

Pass

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Lt Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensed.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'eshortvowelsignrephanusvarade

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Md Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedMedium.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'eshortvowelsignrephanusvarade

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn SmBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

uni20F0.low'

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bold (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn XBd Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'eshortvowelsignrephanusvarade

uni20F0.low'

Warning

Noto Sans Devanagari XCn Bk Regular (NotoSansDevanagari-ExtraCondensedBlack.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'eshortvowelsignrephanusvarade
